job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description:
Embark Trucks is a leading self-driving truck company bringing autonomous freight mainstream. We have raised $117m by partnering with Tiger Global ($70m Series C) and Sequoia Capital ($30m Series B) to help grow our team and introduce our technology to the public. Currently, we move freight daily between LA and Phoenix using our purpose-built transfer hubs. We have aligned ourselves with truck manufacturers , shippers, and carriers to integrate our technology into the freight ecosystem, pursuing a business model where fleets own and operate our trucks. This is an incredibly exciting time for autonomous vehicles and our team is looking to grow.
Our deep learning team focuses on developing systems that sense and perceive the world around our self-driving truck. Within our deep learning team, you will focus on optimizing deep learning algorithms into production-ready self-driving perception systems.
Responsibilities
Build and maintain pipelines and benchmarks to improve model performance
Optimize the training process for deep learning models
Design in-truck validation experiments and conduct full-system integration and tests
Experience Should Include
2-5+ years of professional experience in software engineering with exposure to backend systems
Interest in deep learning and self-driving
Interest in building metrics and visualization systems to track model performance
Strong C++ and Python skills
Preferred Experience
Experience training and optimizing deep learning networks
Experience in designing and building UIs to help monitor experiments, plot results, and visualize benchmarks
Experience in designing and building machine learning/deep learning data pipelines
Prior academic or industrial experience in autonomous driving
Benefits
A full time, competitive salary with equity
Flexible paid vacation from the start
100% of the base insurance option covered for Medical, Dental, and Vision and a buy-up option for other plans
Life insurance covered by Embark
Access to a Flexible Spending Account & 401K Plan
Snacks & catered lunches
Work in a fast-growing startup revolutionizing transportation as we know it
At Embark we celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees.
When you apply, address the application to Kiana and let me know why you want to join our team.
